attributes.action: not to ban dogs that are under the dangerous dog act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: banning certian dogs just beacuse they look dangerous or that have had a couple of inccedents dosent mean that they are all bad and if the right people own them they can be friendly but trying to extinct them is not right at all because itz like trying to get rid of the human race its wrong and shouldnt carry on

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
